Parameters.Name: pLogDir
Parameters.Prompt: Log file directory. (Blank = from TM1 configuration file)

Parameters.Name: pLogDays
Parameters.Prompt: The number of days to retain log Files

Parameters.Name: pErrorDays
Parameters.Prompt: The number of day to retain TM1 Error Logs

Parameters.Name: pBedrockDays
Parameters.Prompt: The number of days to retain Bedrock Debug Files

Parameters.Name: pCSVDays
Parameters.Prompt: The number of days to retain CSV files
